comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/23885771@N03] Is it a bolt-on toilet "room" on the side wall??
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 23885771@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/47290943@N03] Yes, inside would be a flushing toilet and handwash basin. There were still many attached to the Georgian houses back in the 70's but wonder if there's any left now? If I remember right, the floor space was about 5ft x 8ft. 

I knew a house in Gardiner Street that had one and it was the only toilet in the building. If I had to use to it I would enter with slight trepidation harbouring an irrational thought of it falling off the wall with me inside!

They were the height of luxury in their day as before them, there were only outside toilets and many of these were shared between different families.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/23885771@N03] Don't think you were at all irrational to fear plummeting to your death! Stu, I'm adding your bolt-on toilet descripton to our catalogue record for this pic, if that's ok with you...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 23885771@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/47290943@N03] No problem, you go ahead. Thank you.

BTW - the house is at 36 Lower Gardiner Street, Dublin 1 - next time I am in the locality, must go to the rear of the house via the laneway and see if the 'bolt-on' toilet is still there. I would guess there is a correct technical name for these types of toilet - maybe someone could let us know?

Stuart.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/23885771@N03] I can just see you explaining if anyone asks why you're lurking down a laneway, that you're looking for a toilet!  :)
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 23885771@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/47290943@N03] LOL! believe me....I am much more discrete than that....
